original_text: “You shall not oppress your neighbor or rob him. The wages of a hired worker shall not remain with you all night until the morning.
korean_text: 너는 네 이웃을 억압하지 말며 착취하지 말며 품꾼의 삯을 아침까지 밤새도록 네게 두지 말며

sentences.original_text: You shall not oppress your neighbor
The wages of a hired worker
shall not remain with you all night until the morning.
